duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee active job site and ensure the project stays on schedule
Mentor staff and ensure efficient teamwork to complete the project safely, on time, and on budget
Hold meetings with subcontractors to ensure schedule and daily work are understood
Develop and maintain good relationships with owner, architect, and subcontractors
Help develop safety plans and implement safety procedures
Maintain timely and accurate reporting to management

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management or related field (Master's preferred)
